definitions.body: sg. speech, discourse, saying, word, as the sum of that which is spoken:
of men,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[נְבוֹן דָּבָר]] discreet in speech 1Sa 16:18; [[שְׂפָתַיִם]] ´[[ד]] speech of lips Ps 59:13, mere talk Is 36:5 (= 2Ki 18:20) Pr 14:23 (cf. Ps 17:4 speech of God's lips); [[דָּבָר מָר]] bitter speech Ps 64:4; [[כָּזׇב]] ´[[ד]] lying speech Pr 30:8; [[דְּבָֽרְךָ טוֹכ]] thy saying is good 1Sa 9:10; [[וּדְבַר אַבְנֵר הָיׇה עִם]] and the speech of Abner had been with the elders of Israel 2Sa 3:17 (cf. 1Ki 1:7); † [[אמר הדבר הזה]] say this saying Je 23:38, Je 31:23 cf. Je 13:12, Je 14:17 (of God), 1Sa 8:10 (´[[דִּבְרֵי י]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: word of command, [[מֶּלֶח]]([[הַ]]) ´[[ד]] 1Ch 21:4, 1Ch 21:6, Es 1:12 + 6 t. Est, Ec 8:4 cf. 2Ch 30:5, 2Ch 31:5, Da 9:23, Da 9:25; † [[מַלְכוּת]] ´[[ד]] royal edict Es 1:19; [[כדבר עשׂה]] do according to the command of Ge 44:2, Ge 47:30, Ex 8:9, Ex 8:27, Ex 12:35, Ex 32:28 (J) Le 10:7 (P) Ju Jdg 11:10, Ezr 10:5, Ne 5:12, Ne 5:13; cf. 2Sa 17:6 (word of counsel), 1Ki 3:12 (request), 1Ki 17:13 (proposal; on these mngs. v. infr.)

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: message, report, tidings, [[וַיִּשְׁמַע הָעָם]] [[אֶת־הַדָּבָר הָרָע הַזֶּה]] and the people heard this evil report Ex 33:4 (JE) cf. 1Ki 20:12; [[הדבר]] ([[היה]])[[אמת ]] the report was true 1Ki 10:6 = 2Ch 9:5; [[עַד בּוֹא]] [[דָבָר מֵעִמָּכֶם]] until word come from you 2Sa 15:28; [[ויגע הדבר אל מלך נינוה]] Jon 3:6; † [[הֵשִׁיב דָּבָר]] return or bring word, report Ge 37:14, Nu 13:26, Nu 22:8 (J) De 1:22, De 1:25, Jos 14:7, Jos 22:32 (D) 1Ki 2:30, 1Ki 20:9, 2Ki 22:9, 2Ki 22:20 (= 2Ch 34:16, 2Ch 34:28), but answer 1Sa 17:30, 2Sa 3:11, 2Sa 24:13 (= 1Ch 21:12), 1Ki 12:6, 1Ki 12:9 (= 2Ch 10:6, 2Ch 10:9), 1Ki 12:16, Ne 2:20, Pr 18:13, Pr 27:11, Is 41:28, Ez Eze 9:11 (Dr:Sm, p, 190 explains the phrase as turn back with a word); cf. [[ענה]] ([[לא]])[[דבר ]] answer something or nothing 1Ki 18:21, 2Ki 18:36, Ps 119:42, Is 36:21, Je 44:20 vid.

definitions.title: IV. 6;
definitions.body: [[דברים השׁיב]] return words Ex 19:8 (E) Pr 24:26 vid.

definitions.title: III. 1. d.
definitions.body: advice, counsel, [[בדבר בלעם]] by advice of Balaam Nu 31:16 (P), cf. Ju Jdg 20:7, 2Sa 19:44, Es 5:5.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: request, [[אמתו]] of his maid, [[עבדו]] of his servant 2Sa 14:15, 2Sa 14:22.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: promise, [[לא יחל דברו]] he shall not break his word Nu 30:3 (P), cf. [[הקים דבר]] perform a promise Ne 5:13, vid. also

definitions.title: 2 b. g.
definitions.body: charge, complaint, [[אם אמת היה הדבר הזה]] if this charge be true De 22:20 cf. De 13:15, De 17:4, [[שׂים דבר בְּ]] 1Sa 22:15, [[שׂים]] [[עלילות דברים לְ]] De 22:14, De 22:17.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: decision, sentence, [[דְּבַר הַמִּשְׁפָּט]] the sentence of judgment De 17:9 cf. v:De 17:10, v:De 17:11.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: theme, story, [[רָחַשׁ לִבִּי דָּבָר טוֹב]] my heart swells with a good theme Ps 45:2; [[דְּבַרגְּבוּרוֹת]] the story of his great might Job 41:4.
word of God, as a divine communication in the form of commandments, prophecy, and words of help to his people, used 394 times. This word is communicated in several ways:

definitions.title: 6 a
definitions.body: ); [[הדבר אשׁר היה אל]] Je 7:1 + 11 t. Je; † ´[[י]] ´[[את ד]] 2Ki 3:12, Je 23:28, Je 27:18; cf. [[אֵלַי דָּבָר יְגֻנׇּב]] unto me a word was brought by stealth Job 4:12, cf. ´[[וְטֶרֶם יִגׇּלֶה אֵלָיו דְּבַר י]] and the word of Yahweh was not yet revealed unto him 1Sa 3:7. Yahweh also sends his word [[שׁלח]] Ps 107:20, Ps 147:18, Is 9:7, Je 42:5 (cf. pl. Zec 7:12) and makes it an object of vision [[ראה]] Je 2:31, Je 38:21 (cf. pl. Ez Eze 11:25), [[חזה]] Is 2:1; it is also commanded [[חוה]] Ex 16:16, Ex 16:32, Ex 35:4, Le 8:5, Le 9:6, Le 17:2, Nu 30:2, Nu 36:6 (P) De 4:2, De 13:1, De 15:15, Jos 1:13, Jos 4:10 (D) 1Ch 16:15 (= Ps 105:8) Ne 1:8, Je 7:23, cf. [[הדברים אשׁר חוה]] Ex 35:1, Le 8:36 (P) Ex 19:7 (E) De 6:6.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Yahweh confirms his word of promise De 9:5, 1Sa 1:23 (where read [[דְּבָרֵח]] thy word acc. to LXX SyrVer & Dr), 1Ki 2:4, 1Ki 6:12, 1Ki 8:20, Je 29:10, Je 33:14, and his word of warning 1Ki 12:15, Da 9:12; his word stands for ever Is 40:8; it is settled for ever in heaven Ps 119:89; he remembers his holy word [[דבר קדשׁו]] Ps 105:42 (cf. [[דִּבְרֵי קָדְשׁוֹ]] Je 23:9); he himself Joe 2:11, the angels Ps 103:20, and forces of nature Ps 148:8 [[עשׂה דברו]] do his word of command; by his word the heavens were made Ps 33:6; it is near his people, in their mouth and heart De 30:14; a lamp to their feet Ps 119:105.

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: saying, utterance, sentence, as a section of a discourse:—
of men,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[דָּבָר בְּעִתּוֹ]] a word in due season Pr 15:23 cf. Job 4:2, Pr 12:25; commonly in plural, † ([[ה]])[[שִּׁירָ]]([[הַ]])[[דִּבְרֵי ]] words of the song (i.e. its lines of poetry) De 31:30, De 32:44, Ps 18:1 (= 2Sa 22:1) Ps 137:3; [[הלל בדברי דויד]] to sing praises with the words of David (his psalms) 2Ch 29:30; [[דִּבְרֵי חֲכָמִים]] sentences of the wise Pr 1:6, Pr 22:17, Ec 9:17, Ec 12:11; these sayings are commonly written, cf. [[דברי האגרת]] words of the letterEs 9:26; [[הדברים]] [[עתיקים]] the records are ancient 1Ch 4:22; [[דִּבְרֵי]] [[סֵפֶר]]([[ה]]) Is 29:11, Is 29:18, Je 29:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: title of writings: [[דִּבְרֵי קׂהֶלֶת]] Ec 1:1, [[אגור]] ´[[ד]] Pr 30:1, [[למואל]] ´[[ד]] Pr 31:1, [[ירמיהו]] ´[[ד]] Je 1:1, so Am 1:1, Ne 1:1; cf. in appended phrase or clause, Je 51:64, [[איוב]] ´[[ד]] Job 31:40.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in Ch name of a work: [[החזים]] ´[[ד]] 2Ch 33:18, 2Ch 33:19, [[שׁמעיה]] ´[[בד]] 2Ch 12:15, [[יהוא]] ´[[בד]] 2Ch 20:34, ´[[שׁמואל על ד]] 1Ch 29:29; [[נתן]] ´[[על ד]] 1Ch 29:29, 2Ch 9:29, [[גד על]] ´[[ד]] 1Ch 29:29. (It is not certain whether writings of prophets or histories about them are referred to; in the latter case they are acts,

definitions.title: IV. 2,
definitions.body: vid. Dr:Intr 497.)

of God: [[עֲשֶׂרֶת הַדְּבָרִים]] the ten words (sentences in the tables) Ex 34:28 (JE) De 4:13, De 10:4, referred to as [[הדברים]] Ex 34:1 (JE) De 4:10, De 4:36, De 5:19, De 9:10, De 10:2; of commands of covenant code Ex 24:3, Ex 24:4, Ex 24:8 cf. Ex 34:27 (JE); of Deuteronomic code De 17:19 (+ 16 t. D) 2Ki 22:11, 2Ki 23:3-24 (cf. 2 Ch 2Ch 34:19-31) Je 11:2 – 8 Je 34:18; the law-book of Joshua Jos 24:26 (E); of the code of Ezra Ezr 7:11, Ezr 9:4, Ne 8:9, Ne 8:13; the words of Yahweh written by Jeremiah Je 25:13, Je 36:4–Je 36:32 Je 51:61; the words of the book of Daniel Da 12:4, Da 12:9; commands in general 1Sa 15:11, Ps 50:17, Ps 119:57, Ps 119:130, Ps 119:139; promises 2Sa 7:28, Ne 9:8, cf. 1Ch 25:5, 2Ch 36:16.

definitions.title: III.
definitions.body: a word, words:—

of men: [[שָׂפָה אֶחָָת]] [[וּדְבָרִים אֲחָדִים]] one lip, and one and the same words Ge 11:1 (J); [[אֵין אׂמֶר וְאֵין דְּבָרִים]] no speech and no words Ps 19:4; [[אִישׁ דְּבָרִים]] man of words, ready in speech, Ex 4:10 (J); [[רב דברים]] multitude of words Job 11:2, Pr 10:19, Ec 5:2; [[קְחוּ עִמָּכֶם דְּבָרִים]] take with you words Ho 14:3; [[שׁקר]]([[ה]]) ([[י]])[[דבר]] lying word(s) Ex 5:9, Ex 23:7 (E) Pr 13:5, Pr 29:12, Is 59:13, Je 7:4, Je 7:8; [[דִּבְרֵי רוּחַ]] words of wind, vain words Job 16:3; [[וּמַה־שֶּׁמֶץ דָּבָר נִשְׁמַע־בּוֹ]] and what a whisper of a word we hear of him! Job 26:14.
of God. It is difficult to determine how many of the following should come under

definitions.title: II. 2.
definitions.body: The pl. for words of God is relatively seldom: Ge 20:8, Ex 19:6, Nu 12:6, Jos 3:9 (E) Ex 4:28, Ex 4:30, Nu 11:24 (J) De 18:19, Jos 23:14 (D) 1Sa 3:18, 1Sa 8:10, 1Sa 15:1, 2Ch 11:4, Job 42:7, Pr 30:6, Is 31:2, Da 10:11, Am 8:11, Mic 2:7, apart from Je 3:12 + 30 t. Je, Ez Eze 2:7 + 4 t. Ez, Zec 1:6 + 4 t. Zc.

definitions.title: IV.
definitions.body: matter, affair, thing about which one speaks:—

business, occupation: [[דְּבַר הַמֶּלֶח]] king's business 1Sa 21:9; [[לְכָל־דְּבַר]] for every matter of 1Ch 26:32, 1Ch 27:1, 2Ch 19:11; [[דְּבָרֶיךָ לְכָל־]] for all thine affairs 1Ch 28:21; [[דבר]] [[המזבח]] Nu 18:7; [[דָּבָר אֵין־לָהֶם עִם]] they had not dealings with Ju Jdg 18:7, Jdg 18:28; † [[דְּבַר־יוֹם בְּיוֹמוֹ]] the task or portion of a day in its day, daily duty or due Ex 5:13, Ex 5:19 (E) Ex 16:4 (J) Le 23:37 (P) 1Ki 8:59, 2Ki 25:30, 1Ch 16:37, 2Ch 8:13 ([[ביום]]) v:2Ch 8:14, 2Ch 31:16, Ezr 3:4, Ne 11:23, Ne 12:47, Je 52:34, Da 1:5; † [[דבר שׁנה בשׁנה]] 1Ki 10:25, 2Ch 9:24.

pl. acts cstr. [[דִּבְרֵי]] 1Ki 11:41, 1Ki 11:41, 1Ch 29:29, 2Ch 12:15, 2Ch 16:11; † [[דְּבָרָיו]] his acts 2Ch 13:22, 2Ch 35:27; especially in phrases, [[עַל־סֵפֶר דִּבְרֵי]]…[[וְיֶתֶר דִּבְרֵי ]] [[הַיׇּמִים]] and the rest of the acts of…in the book of the chronicles (daily record of events) of 1Ki 14:29 + 32 t. K.; [[וְיֶתֶר דִּבְרֵי]] 2Ch 13:22 + 8 t. Ch, [[וְיֶתֶר דְּבָרָיו]] 2Ch 28:26, [[שְׁאָר דִּבְרֵי]] 2Ch 9:29 are referred to various sources; cf. also [[במספר]] [[דברי הימים]] 1Ch 27:24, [[בדברי דויד]] 1Ch 23:27, [[על־דברי מלכי ישׂראל]] 2Ch 33:18: [[דברים טובים]] good deeds 2Ch 12:12, <chbr idref="2 Ch 19:13">19:13</chbr>; [[דִּבְרֵי עֲוֹנׁת]] acts of iniquity Ps 65:4 (De, Fälle von Missethaten); [[דִּבְרֵי־רָע]] evil deeds Je 5:28. It is used of God, only in [[כל דבריו]] [[לא יענה]] Job 33:13, [[אׂתוֹתָיו]] ´[[ד]] Ps 105:27, [[נִפְלְאׂתֶיךָ]] ´[[ד]] Ps 145:5.

matter, affair: [[דבר אוריה]] affair of Uriah 1Ki 15:5; [[שׁרשׁ דבר]] root of the matter Job 19:28; [[מה היה הדבר]] how went the matter ? 1Sa 4:16, 2Sa 1:4 cf. Ru 3:18; [[סבב את פני הדבר]] change the face of the matter 2Sa 14:20; [[דִּבְרֵי הָאֲתׂנוֹת]] the matter of the asses 1Sa 10:2; [[זה דבר הרחח]] this is the case of the slayer De 19:4; [[לְכָל־דְּבָרָיו]] 1Ki 6:38 as to all its particulars.

events, things: in the phrase, † [[אחר הדברים האלה]] after these things (events in time) Ge 15:1, Ge 22:1, Ge 40:1 (E) Ge 39:7 (J) 1Ki 17:17, 1Ki 21:1, Ezr 7:1, Es 2:1, Es 3:1; † [[האלה אחרי הדברים]] Ge 48:1, Jos 24:29 (E) Ge 22:20 (J) 2Ch 32:1.

cause, case for judicial investigation: [[כִּי־יִהְיֶה]] [[לָהֶם דָּבָר]] if they have a case Ex 18:16 cf. Ex 18:22, Ex 22:8; [[בעל דברים]] one having a case Ex 24:14, cf. [[בדבר]] [[משׁפט]] 2Ch 19:6; [[דְּבָרֶיךָ טוֹבִים וּנְכׂחִים]] pleas, good and right 2Sa 15:3 cf. Jos 20:4.

something, anything (indefinite): [[עשׂה דבר]] do a thing Ge 22:16 + (frequent); [[עשׂה דברים]] Is 42:16 + (less frequent); [[דבר]] ´[[היפלא מי]] Ge 18:14 cf. Je 32:17, Je 32:27; [[דבר]]…[[לא ]] nothing 1Ki 5:7, 1Ki 10:3, Is 39:2, Je 42:4 + (frequent), [[אין דבר]] Ex 5:11 (E) Nu 20:19, 1Sa 20:21; ´[[לא דבר מ]] nothing of Ex 9:4 (J) Jos 8:35, Jos 11:15, Jos 21:45, Jos 23:14 (D); [[כל דבר]] anything Nu 31:23, De 23:20 +; [[דבר רע]] Ps 141:4 +; [[טוב]] ´[[ד]] 1Ki 14:13 + ; [[דְּבַר־מָה]] whatsoever Nu 23:3 (E); [[עֶרְוַת דבר]] De 23:15 naked-ness of a thing, i.e. unclean or unseemly thing (indecency in camp); so of a wife De 24:1.

way, manner: [[זֶה דְּבַר הַשִּׁמִטָּה]] this is the manner of the release De 15:2 (cf. SI:1); [[כֵּן דְּבַר]] [[הַמֶּלֶח]] so was the way of the king Es 1:13; [[הזה כדבר]] after this manner, thus † Ge 18:25, Ge 32:20, Ge 44:7 (JE) 2Sa 15:6, Ezr 10:5, Ne 5:12, Ne 5:13 with ([[עשׂה]]), 1Sa 9:21, 2Sa 14:3, 2Sa 17:6 ([[דבר]]), 1Sa 17:27; 1Sa 17:30 Is 8:20 ([[אמר]]), Ne 6:4, Ne 6:5 ([[שׁלח]]), Ne 6:4 ([[השׁיב]]) cf. 1Sa 17:30, 2Ki 7:19 ([[היה]]) (peculiar to D, [[כדבר הרע הזה]] such a wicked deed as this De 13:12, De 19:20, [[כדבר הגדול הזה]] De 4:32); [[כדברים האלה עשׂה]] thus and thus did he Ge 39:19 (J) 1Sa 2:23 (but usually the pl. = these words).

reason, cause: [[זֶּה דְבַר־הַמַּס]] 1Ki 9:15; [[זה הדבר]] [[אשׁר]] this is the reason why Jos 5:4 (D) 1Ki 11:27; so 1Sa 17:29 AV RV, was it not but a word ? Th Ke RVm VB Dr; …[[עַל דְּבַר]] because of, for the sake of Ge 20:11, Ge 20:18 (E) Ge 12:17, Ge 43:18, Ex 8:8 (J) Nu 17:14 (P) Ps 45:5, Ps 79:9, [[עַל דִּבְרֵי]] Je 14:1; [[עַל־דִּבְרֵיכֶם]] for your sakes De 4:21, [[עַל דְּבַר אשׁר]] De 22:24, De 22:24, De 23:5, 2Sa 13:22.
